entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:49 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 10:00 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 32 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: NNE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
